kpi.name: RNC_790a
kpi.formula: ( intersho.is_hho_w_cm_lb_prx_tot_rt + intersho.is_hho_w_cm_lb_ptx_tot_rt + intersho.is_hho_w_cm_lb_rsvr_sc_rt + intersho.is_hho_w_cm_lb_res_lim_rt + intersho.is_hho_wo_cm_lb_prx_tot_rt + intersho.is_hho_wo_cm_lb_ptx_tot_rt + intersho.is_hho_wo_cm_lb_rsvr_sc_rt + intersho.is_hho_wo_cm_lb_res_lim_rt )

kpi_info.title: Measurement started for LB ISHO RT
kpi_info.use: The number of Load Based inter-system HHO decisions after measuring with compressed mode by UEs with RT connection.
kpi_info.formula:
sum( IS_HHO_W_CM_LB_PRX_TOT_RT
+ IS_HHO_W_CM_LB_PTX_TOT_RT
+ IS_HHO_W_CM_LB_RSVR_SC_RT
+ IS_HHO_W_CM_LB_RES_LIM_RT
+ IS_HHO_WO_CM_LB_PRX_TOT_RT
+ IS_HHO_WO_CM_LB_PTX_TOT_RT
+ IS_HHO_WO_CM_LB_RSVR_SC_RT
+ IS_HHO_WO_CM_LB_RES_LIM_RT )

kpi.kpi_alias: Measurement started for LB ISHO RT
